About Take Sushi Take Sushi is a Fast Food restaurant located at 2661 E Atlantic Blvd in Pompano Beach, FL 33062. Take Sushi has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
